articles.title: Oblivion Remastered Gets First Gorgeous 4K Texture Packs - Wccftech
articles.description: The first Oblivion Remastered 4K texture pack is now available for download, introducing enhanced textures for armor, weapons, and clothing.
articles.content:
The first Oblivion Remastered 4K texture pack is now available for download, introducing high-quality upscaled textures that significantly improve the vanilla ones.
